top.title: Bodies of missing mum and child found in freezers in Austria
top.summary: Public prosecutor Hansjörg Mayr says two men, aged 55 and 53, are being held on "strong suspicion of murder".

top.title: French energy giant Total faces war crimes allegations over Mozambique massacre
top.summary: TotalEnergies denies responsibility for the actions of local security forces involved in dozens of killings.

top.title: Ex-Harvard president Larry Summers steps back from public role after Epstein email release
top.summary: The former US treasury secretary says he is "ashamed" of his emails to the late sex offender.

top.title: Roblox blocks children from chatting to adult strangers
top.summary: One of the world's most popular gaming platforms has faced criticism for its child safety record.

top.title: Cloudflare apologises for outage which took down X and ChatGPT
top.summary: "We apologise to our customers and the Internet in general" the web infrastructure company said.

top.title: Man who cryogenically froze late wife sparks debate by dating new partner
top.summary: Gui Junmin froze his dead spouse as a sign of his devotion - but it's now emerged he is dating again.

title.#text: Apple’s custom Wi-Fi chip gives the iPhone 17 a notable boost, according to speed tests
A massive Cloudflare outage brought down X, ChatGPT, and even Downdetector
Meta is not a monopolist, judge rules
